home.title: Your journey starts here!
home.description1: Each village around Lake Atitl√°n holds a special charm, from colorful traditions to unique crafts, inviting you to discover Guatemala's rich cultural diversity.
home.description2: Explore the villages around Lake Atitl√°n on our shared boats and discover their charms.
home.description3: Adventure on wheels! Enjoy an exciting ATV tour.
home.description4: Discover the most popular destinations with our convenient scheduled transfers. Travel in comfort and safety, without worrying about anything else.
home.description5: Discover the beauty of Guatemala on our boats. Sail across Lake Atitl√°n and enjoy panoramic views.
home.header1: We are your best choice to explore Guatemala
home.subtitle2: Discover the soul of Guatemala with us. Are you ready to live an unforgettable experience? From majestic mountains to paradise beaches, Guatemala awaits you with open arms. Our agency in Panajachel offers a wide variety of tours and packages for you to explore this beautiful country at your own pace. Can you imagine sailing through the crystal-clear waters of Lake Atitl√°n, exploring ancient Mayan ruins, or simply relaxing on a white sand beach? With us, every trip is a unique adventure. Book now and start creating unforgettable memories!
home.subtitle3: Your safety is our priority. At Milan Tours, we are committed to providing you with a peaceful and safe journey. We have local expert guides who know each destination perfectly, safe and reliable vehicles. Relax and enjoy your adventure, knowing that we are taking care of you.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a company committed to providing the best transportation service, ensuring comfort, safety, and punctuality on every trip.
about.subtitle: About Milan
about.descriptionPlatform: At Milan Tours, our mission is to offer unforgettable experiences to every traveler who wishes to discover the magic of Guatemala. Located in the heart of Panajachel, on the shores of the majestic Lake Atitl√°n, we specialize in providing transfer services, personalized tours, and adventure activities that combine safety, comfort, and cultural authenticity.
about.extraInfoPlatform: Our passion is to connect people with the essence of Guatemala, offering safe, exciting trips filled with unforgettable moments.
about.descriptionHistory: Guatemala. Since our beginnings, we have worked passionately to design unique experiences that allow visitors to discover the essence of the country, its natural wealth, and the warmth of its people. Today, Milan Tours is synonymous with trust and quality in the tourism industry.
about.extraInfoHistory: Our commitment goes beyond offering tours; we want each journey to be an authentic adventure filled with unforgettable moments. We strive to provide exceptional service, ensuring that every detail makes your experience special.
about.coreValuesDescription: At Milan Tours, our essence is based on providing authentic experiences that connect people with the beauty and cultural richness of Guatemala. Our mission is to be the bridge between travelers and the wonders of our country, ensuring every detail so that your adventures are unforgettable, safe, and comfortable. We believe in sustainable tourism that respects and enriches both our visitors and the local communities.
about.value1Description: We are driven by pride in our country. Every experience we offer is designed to highlight the culture, nature, and traditions that make Guatemala unique.
about.value2Description: The peace of mind of our clients is our priority. We strive to offer safe, reliable, and professional services at every stage of the journey.
about.value3Description: We promote genuine experiences that connect travelers with the essence of Guatemala. From cultural tours to adventure activities, every detail reflects authenticity and respect for local communities.

contact.title: Connect with Milan Tours!
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us and discover how we can make your trip an unforgettable experience.
contact.card1.title: Quick and personalized attention
contact.card1.description: Contact us and get immediate assistance
contact.card2.title: Visit us
contact.card2.description: Need more information? You can visit us, we would be happy to assist you
contact.socialMediaTitle: You can also contact us through our social media!

services.title: Our services
services.subtitle: Discover the magic of Guatemala with Milan Tours. Located in the heart of Panajachel, we invite you to experience a unique and personalized adventure. Our team of local experts will help you create the perfect itinerary to explore the natural and cultural wonders of this beautiful country at your own pace.
services.subtitle1: The best exchange rate awaits you! Exchange your dollars and euros to quetzals and maximize your budget.
services.subtitle2: Travel worry-free! We take you to any corner of Guatemala with comfort and punctuality.
services.subtitle3: Exclusivity and comfort on every trip. Enjoy a private and personalized transfer.
services.subtitle4: Explore the towns around Lake Atitl√°n on our shared boats and discover their charms.
services.subtitle5: Lake adventure! Enjoy water activities like canopy, paragliding, and hiking.

serviceD.description1: Exchange your money quickly and safely. We offer the best exchange rates in the market.
serviceD.d1: Exchange your dollars and euros for quetzales at the best rates. Enjoy a fast and reliable service for your currency exchange needs.

esp1.d1: It is important to mention that in order to carry out the currency exchange, the money must be in acceptable conditions for the exchange.

serviceD.description2: Your journey starts here! Enjoy the comfort of being picked up and dropped off at your hotel, airport, or any other destination. Our professional drivers will ensure a safe and punctual trip, tailored to your needs.
serviceD.d2: Our door-to-door transfer service takes you comfortably and safely between popular destinations in Guatemala and Mexico, with professional drivers and comfortable, air-conditioned vehicles. Travel with peace of mind with our service tailored to your schedules and destinations!

esp2.d1: Regular service: Scheduled departures to popular destinations with pre-established schedules.
esp2.d2: Fixed routes: Set routes including transfers to your hotel or accommodation.
esp2.d3: Professional driver: Trained personnel for a safe trip.
esp2.d4: Comfortable vehicles: Units with ample space and in good condition.
esp2.d7: Panajachel to Antigua: 5:00 am, 5:30 am, 9:00 am, 12:00 pm, 4:00 pm
esp2.d8: Antigua to Panajachel: 8:00 am, 12:30 pm, 4:00 pm
esp2.d9: Panajachel to Guatemala City: 5:00 am, 9:00 am, 12:00 pm, 4:00 pm
esp2.d10: Guatemala City to Panajachel: 6:00 am, 11:00 am, 2:00 pm
esp2.d11: Antigua to Guatemala City: 4:00 am, 9:00 am, 12:30 pm, 6:30 pm
esp2.d12: Panajachel to Chichicastenango (market day) Thursday and Sunday: Departure - 8:00 am (Q.75.00 p/p) / Return - 2:00 pm (Q.75.00 p/p)
esp2.d13: Panajachel to Quetzaltenango: 5:00 am, 9:00 am, 3:00 pm
esp2.d14: Panajachel to San Cristobal de las Casas Mexico City: 5:00 am, 6:00 am
esp2.d15: Panajachel to Cob√°n - Lanqu√≠n: 7:30 am (direct) / 5:00 am, 9:00 am (via Guatemala City)

esp2.d17: Panajachel to R√≠o Dulce: 5:00 am, 9:00 am
esp2.d18: Panajachel to El Pared√≥n: 9:00 am (via Antigua) Approximate travel time 3.5 to 4 hrs, 1:00 pm (direct) Approximate travel time 2.5 to 3 hrs

serviceD.description3: Exclusivity and comfort in every trip. Enjoy a private and personalized transfer.
serviceD.d3: Our private shuttles offer the best experience in exclusive travel. Enjoy a comfortable and secure transfer with personalized service.

esp3.d1: Exclusive service: Private trip just for you and your companions, with the option of returning to the departure point, no matter the route.
esp3.d2: Customized routes: Flexibility in schedule and pickup/destination point.
esp3.d3: Professional driver: Trained driver to ensure your safety and comfort.
esp3.d4: Modern and well-equipped vehicles: Recent, comfortable, and safe units, with a capacity for 13 people.
esp3.d5: Air conditioning: For a cool and pleasant journey.

serviceD.description4: Discover the beauty of Guatemala with our boat tours. Explore the jungle, discover the volcanoes, and experience an unforgettable adventure.
serviceD.d4: Embark on our public boat tours and explore the most beautiful corners of Guatemala, surrounded by nature and good company.

esp4.d5: Includes guide for the entire tour.
esp4.d6: 3 Village Tour: Santiago Atitl√°n, San Pedro La Laguna, and San Pedro La Laguna - Departure: 9:00 AM - Return: 3:00 PM

serviceD.description5: Discover the beauty of Guatemala with our private boat tours. Explore the jungle, discover the volcanoes, and experience an unforgettable adventure.
serviceD.d5: Enjoy a private boat tour where you can explore Guatemala in an exclusive and personalized way, tailored to your interests.

esp5.d1: Private Boat: Round trip with total comfort.
esp5.d2: Flexible Schedule: Choose your start time (7:00 AM - 5:00 PM). Additional charge for tours outside these hours.
esp5.d3: Time to Explore: We adapt to your pace.
esp5.d4: Life jackets: Safety is our priority.
esp5.d5: Great atmosphere: Music, laughter, and guaranteed fun.
esp5.d6: Seated with backrest: Relax and enjoy the scenery comfortably.
esp5.d8: 1 Village Tour: Choose a village from the 14 villages of Solol√° and we‚Äôll take you there. Includes round trip. We adapt to your time. No guide included. Departure anytime (7:00 AM to 5:00 PM).
esp5.d9: 3 Village Tour: San Juan la Laguna, Santiago Atitl√°n, and San Pedro La Laguna. No guide included. Departure anytime (7:00 AM to 5:00 PM).
esp5.d10: 3 Village Tour: Santiago Atitl√°n, San Juan la Laguna, and San Juan la Laguna. Departure anytime (7:00 AM to 5:00 PM). Includes bilingual guide for the entire tour.
esp5.d11: 3 Village Tour: San Lucas Tolim√°n, San Lucas Tolim√°n, and Santiago Atitl√°n. Departure anytime (7:00 AM to 5:00 PM). Includes bilingual guide for the entire tour.
esp5.d12: Medium Tour: Hot Springs, Hot Springs, and San Antonio Palopo. Departure anytime (7:00 AM to 5:00 PM). Includes bilingual guide for the entire tour.
esp5.d13: 4 Village Tour: San Marcos la Laguna, San Juan la Laguna, San Juan la Laguna, and San Pedro la Laguna. Departure anytime (7:00 AM to 5:00 PM).

serviceD.description6: Immerse yourself in Maya culture and discover the traditions of each village.
serviceD.d6: Travel through the villages of Guatemala and connect with Maya culture, their traditions, and the rich history of each place.

esp6.d1: Adventures: You will have the opportunity to experience unforgettable moments in each village.
esp6.d2: Culture: Discover the Maya culture and its traditional customs.
esp6.d3: Handicrafts: Explore local handicrafts and enjoy artisanal products.
esp6.d4: History: Learn about the history of each village and discover its past.

serviceD.description7: Live a unique experience in the Mayan jungle. Explore the ancient ruins and rich biodiversity of Tikal.
serviceD.d7: Venture into the Tikal jungle, an archaeological and natural site where you can explore ancient ruins, enjoy the biodiversity, and connect with Mayan history.

esp7.d1: Hotel transportation in Guatemala to the airport
esp7.d6: Does not include hotel in Guatemala
esp7.d7: Daily departures at 6:00 AM with return at 6:30 PM the same day.

serviceD.description8: Discover the city of eternal winds. Visit artisan markets, volcanoes, and historic sites.
serviceD.d8: Explore Quetzaltenango, the city of eternal winds, and immerse yourself in its history, local art, and beautiful volcanic landscapes.

esp8.d3: Relax in the hot springs (Fuentes Georginas)
esp8.d4: Zunil, Maximon, soul cofrade and more!
esp8.d5: Daily departures at 8:00 AM with return at 5:00 PM the same day.

serviceD.description9: Ascend to San Pedro Volcano and enjoy panoramic views of Lake Atitl√°n.
serviceD.d9: Climb the majestic San Pedro Volcano and enjoy spectacular views of Lake Atitl√°n. A challenge for hiking and nature enthusiasts.

esp9.d1: Transport from your hotel to the public dock.
esp9.d2: Boat ride from Panajachel to San Pedro and vice versa.

serviceD.description10: Travel comfortably and safely on our buses. Book your tickets now!
serviceD.d10: Our buses offer a comfortable and safe journey, with routes that connect you easily and quickly. Book your ticket and travel with us!
serviceD.description11: Comfortable and safe transportation on every trip, our services operate every day of the week.
serviceD.d11: Travel the route between Guatemala and El Salvador with comfort and safety. Enjoy the landscape while traveling with us every day.

esp11.d2: Class - Departure: 2:00 PM Note: Double-decker (sleeping seat)

serviceD.description12: Come and enjoy bike tours, discovering unforgettable landscapes along the way.
serviceD.d12: Ride through Guatemala on two wheels, enjoying stunning landscapes while exercising and having a unique experience.
serviceD.description13: Book your domestic and international flights with us and travel worry-free.
serviceD.d13: Arrive at your destination safely and comfortably, whether within Guatemala or around the world. With our wide range of flights, making your next trip a reality has never been easier.
serviceD.description14: Embark on a hiking adventure through the beautiful landscapes of Guatemala. Explore mountains, forests, and volcanoes while connecting with nature.
serviceD.d14: Experience a unique adventure hiking through Guatemala's trails, surrounded by incredible biodiversity and landscapes that will leave you breathless. Nature awaits!

esp14.d1: Tour to San Pedro Volcano: Guide, round-trip boat, breakfast and lunch, park entrance, transportation in San Pedro town to reach the park.
esp14.d2: Tour to Nariz del Indio (San Juan la Laguna): Round-trip transportation, guide, entrance, coffee or tea in the morning.
esp14.d3: Maya Altar Tour (San Jorge and Solol√°): Transportation, guide, entrance fees, small snack.

serviceD.description15: Embark on an exciting ATV adventure through the stunning landscapes of Guatemala. Feel the adrenaline as you explore the wildest nature.

esp15.d1: Pro Tour - with guide (extra) - The tour includes helmets, goggles, and in case of rain, raincoats - Visit 2 towns: Santa Catarina Palopo, San Antonio Palop√≥, San Antonio Palop√≥, Visit to the Cultural Center, Chocolate Factory, and Viewpoints.
esp15.d2: Santa Catarina Palopo Tour - with guide (extra) - The tour includes helmets, goggles, and in case of rain, raincoats. - Visit 1 town: Cultural Center, Malec√≥n, Hot Springs.
esp15.d3: Viewpoint Tour - with guide (extra) - The tour includes helmets, goggles, and in case of rain, raincoats - Main street of Panajachel, Lakefront of Panajachel, Viewpoint.
esp15.d5: Note: Minors cannot drive (they can ride as passengers). Adults must have a driver‚Äôs license or DPI.

serviceD.d15: Enjoy an exciting ATV experience as you explore the wild beauty of Guatemala, from volcanoes to jungles.
serviceD.description16: Fly between the treetops and enjoy a unique view of the Guatemalan jungle on our canopy tours. An experience full of adrenaline and nature!
serviceD.d16: Enjoy a unique journey over the treetops and discover the majesty of the Guatemalan jungle from an incredible perspective. An experience that will make you feel on top of the world! The cost includes all the attractions of the reserve: Butterfly House at the Geodome, trails, hanging bridges, children's play area, private lake shore, and visitor center.

esp16.d1: Ultra Extreme: Cross part of the valley and reach the tip of the San Buenaventura bay. On the way back, pass by the coffee plantation. The ultra-extreme cables offer the most spectacular views of the lake and the longest cables. The tour includes a walk along a horseshoe path used by merchants from the highlands in the past. There is a weight limit of 250 lbs depending on the speed of the cables.
esp16.d2: Extreme: Passes over waterfalls, canyons, the valley, and the coffee forest. Compared to the Ultra cables, this tour offers a variety of scenarios crossing picturesque parts of the valley. These cables are generally shorter and serve as a great introduction to extreme experiences.
esp16.d3: The canopy service is only available at the following times: 9:00 AM, 11:00 AM, 1:00 PM, and 3:00 PM. Customers must be 40 minutes before the scheduled time at the agency. It also includes transportation from our agency to the service location only.
esp16.d4: Extreme Cable Specifications: Number of cables: 8 Total length: 1300 m Cable lengths: 90 m to 320 m Maximum cable height: 25 m Duration of the tour: 1 hour and 30 minutes Length of the trail to the cables: 450 m Vertical ascent on the trail: 80 m
esp16.d5: Ultra Extreme Cable Specifications: Number of cables: 7, total cable distance: 2,381 m, cable lengths: 90 m to 860 m. Yes, you read that correctly, it‚Äôs a big stretch. Maximum cable height: 55 m, tour duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes, length of the trail to the cables: 900 m, vertical ascent on the trail: 136 m.
esp16.d6: Low ropes: Both the extreme and ultra-extreme cables end in an optional low ropes course. See if you can cross the river on thin planks or swing from one swing to another.

esp17.d1: Flight hours: Available from 7:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
esp17.d4: Recommended clothing: Wear sportswear for better comfort.
esp17.d5: Flight duration: Approximately 15 to 30 minutes, subject to weather conditions.
esp17.d6: Includes: An expert guide who will accompany you throughout the flight.
esp17.d7: Safety equipment: All necessary equipment is provided for a safe and thrilling experience.
esp17.d8: The price includes transportation from our travel agency in Panajachel to the take-off area.
esp17.d9: Payment is made in advance to secure your spot in the service.
esp17.d10: Paragliding is considered an extreme sport and you will fly at your own risk.
esp17.d11: Discounts available for groups of more than 5 people.

serviceD.description17: Enjoy panoramic views of the lake and volcanoes while paragliding. An irresistible experience!
serviceD.d17: Fly over the lake and volcanoes, enjoying panoramic views that only paragliding can offer. An exciting and irresistible experience!
serviceD.description18: Embark on an exciting kayak journey through the stunning landscapes of Guatemala. Feel the adrenaline as you explore the wildest nature.
serviceD.d18: Navigate through the calm and beautiful landscapes of Guatemala in a kayak. Discover the secrets of nature as you explore lakes and rivers from a unique perspective.

esp18.d1: Takes place at Bahia de San Buenaventura
esp18.d3: The service includes one-way transport, with departure times from 6:00 AM to 12:00 PM (subject to weather), and includes life jackets.

serviceD.description19: Rent a jet ski and feel the thrill of riding on the lake. An incredible experience!
serviceD.d19: Feel the excitement to the fullest while riding the waters of Guatemala on a jet ski. An adrenaline-filled experience!
serviceD.description20: Observe a wide variety of birds in their natural habitat. An irresistible experience!
serviceD.d20: Enjoy a unique experience while watching birds in their natural environment. The biodiversity of Guatemala will surprise you.
serviceD.description21: Enjoy a taxi tour (tuc tuc) and discover the most beautiful corners of Guatemala. Discover the beauty of Guatemala with us!
serviceD.d21: Explore the charms of Guatemala in a unique way by taking a taxi (tuc tuc). A ride full of history, culture, and stunning landscapes.

esp21.d1: Pro Tour - with guide - Visit to 2 towns: Santa Catarina Palopo, San Antonio Palop√≥, Visit to the Cultural Center, Chocolate Factory, Viewpoints.
esp21.d2: Santa Catarina Palop√≥ Tour - with guide - Visit to 1 town: Cultural Center, Malec√≥n, Hot Springs.
esp21.d3: Viewpoint Tour - with guide: Main street of Panajachel, Lakeshores of Panajachel, Viewpoint.

serviceD.description22: Live a unique experience sailing on the stunning Lake Atitl√°n. Enjoy spectacular landscapes while carrying out your dream activity on Lake Atitl√°n.
serviceD.d22: Sail through the crystal-clear waters of Lake Atitl√°n, enjoying the beauty of its surroundings: volcanoes, indigenous villages, and vibrant nature. A journey full of history and culture in every corner while enjoying your event. Important note: Only the boat is rented, food, drinks, and decorations are not included. The same tours offered in a boat can be done, with the advantage that the boat can carry many more people.

esp22.d1: San Marcos: üçΩ Delicious restaurants üßò‚Äç‚ôÄ Meditation and yoga ü§ø Famous trampoline: Dare to jump and take a dip in the lake! üé® Picturesque murals üíÜ Excellent massages
esp22.d2: San Juan: üñº Art and culture üåø Ecotourism üåã Panoramic views üèû Famous Kaqasiiwaan viewpoint: Capture spectacular views of the lake and surrounding areas. üè° Community tour: Learn about textile, honey, chocolate, painting, and coffee processes. ‚òÇ Umbrella Street üé© Hat Street üèî Indian Nose Viewpoint
esp22.d3: San Pedro: üö£‚Äç‚ôÇ Kayak rental üêé Horseback riding üçΩ Lakeside restaurants üå∫ El Colibr√≠ Viewpoint üñê Jade Hand üì∏ Photo spots ‚òï Best coffee places
esp22.d4: Santiago Atitl√°n: üìú Story of the Lady of the Coin üõç Artisan market üé® Paintings ü™µ Wood carvings ‚õ™ Colonial church üçΩ Restaurants ü¶ú Bird watching üï¥ Meet Maxim√≥n
esp22.d5: üìç Santa Catarina Palop√≥: Cultural Center with exhibits on the history and traditions of the town. Beautiful waterfront with a stunning view of the lake and volcanoes. Natural hot springs by the shore. Cobblestone streets with murals and houses painted with Mayan designs. Traditional crafts, especially textiles and decorated ceramics. Painting workshops where locals teach art.
esp22.d6: üìç San Antonio Palop√≥: Artisan chocolate factory where you can see the process and taste different flavors. Ceramic factory with unique, hand-painted pieces. Viewpoints with spectacular views of the lake and volcanoes. Colonial church with simple architecture.

serviceD.description23: Find the perfect home for your stay in Guatemala through Airbnb. Enjoy comfort, privacy, and a unique experience in selected properties in the best destinations in the country.
serviceD.d23: Rent unique homes through Airbnb, tailored to your needs, whether near Lake Atitl√°n, the city of Antigua, or other beautiful corners of Guatemala. Live like a local with all the comforts.

esp23.d1: Casa del R√≠o, Panajachel: Capacity for 10 people, includes 3 bedrooms, 4 double beds, 1 sofa bed, living room, equipped kitchen, dining room, balcony, 1 bathroom with tub, hot water, cable TV, Wi-Fi, and parking service.
esp23.d2: Bungalows Casa Aine, Panajachel: Capacity for 7 people, includes 2 bedrooms, the first bedroom with 2 double beds and 1 king-size bed, cable TV, the second bedroom includes 1 double bed, cable TV, Wi-Fi, green area, equipped kitchen, and parking service.
esp23.d3: Apartment in the Riviera de Atitl√°n: Includes 2 bedrooms for 8 people, kitchen, living room, dining room, Wi-Fi, lake view, private beach, includes heated pool and jacuzzi.

serviceD.description24: Bicicables is an exciting activity that combines the feeling of flying with the fun of riding a bike. It involves a bike ride suspended on steel cables, crossing the beautiful San Buenaventura valley. The route offers spectacular panoramic views of the lake, surrounding volcanoes, coffee farms, and oak forests.

listB24.b1: Unique and thrilling experience: Bicicables provides an adrenaline rush and an unmatched sense of freedom.
listB24.b2: Stunning panoramic views: Enjoy breathtaking landscapes of the lake, volcanoes, and surrounding nature from a unique perspective.
listB24.b3: Connection with nature: Immerse yourself in the beauty of the natural surroundings while enjoying the activity.
listB24.b4: Activity for the whole family: Bicicables is a safe and fun activity for people of all ages.

serviceD.d24: The Bicicables ride lasts approximately 20 minutes, each cable is 250 meters long, and the maximum height is 18 meters. The access trail to the cables is 200 meters long, with a vertical climb of 37 meters. The service has experienced guides who ensure the safety of participants and includes the use of safety harnesses. The number of bikes used per Bicicable is two.

esp24.d1: Number of bikes: 3, two for each Bicicable
esp24.d5: Length of the trail to the cables: 200 m
esp24.d6: Vertical ascent on the trail: 37 m
